q: 2011 Earlier this week`` The X Factor'''s Simon Cowell confessed that he is a`` massive fan of Paula Abdul .'' On Tuesday night Paula Abdul told Jay Leno that she felt that was an understatement. I think you need to take` mass' off and put` obsessive,' said Paula Abdul when asked about her thoughts on Simon Cowell 's comment. The singer then clarified,`` He's obsessed with me.''
